thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: Joan Gregory

author: Joan Gregory
title: Joan Gregory
text:
I have been ordering from Munchery for at least the past six months or more. They have a large variety of dishes to choose from, and new dishes are always added. They are very flavorful and easy to prepare - usually it only takes 2-3 minutes in the microwave to heat up. They often come with additional condiments.
One thing I like is the ability to choose an hour window for delivery, and then the ability to track the progress of the delivery driver. I can be waiting at the door when he/she drives up.
